episodes.title: Tony & Susan Alamo - Tony Alamo Sings Mister D.J. (1977, Psychedelic Cult & Gospel) (FULL ALBUM)
episodes.description:
No copyright infringement intended belongs to the Record Label/Company and the Artist

00:00 Mister D.J.
02:46 Lord, Hold My Hand
04:41 Swing Down Sweet Chariot
07:24 Stand By Me
10:04 Sunday School To Broadway
13:07 So High
15:03 If The Lord Wasn't Walking By My Side
16:55 Lead Me, Guide Me
19:24 Working On The Building
21:10 Onward Christian Soldiers

This record was made by Tony and Susan Alamo, founders of a religious group called the Alamo Christian Foundation. Over time, the group became known for being very closed and strict, with strong control over its members.

This video is shared for educational and cultural purposes only. It does not support or promote the group. It’s part of a music archive that explores how sound and belief systems were used together.

After Susan passed away, Tony Alamo was arrested and sentenced for serious crimes related to how he treated people inside the group. The community was mostly shut down, though some followers stayed active for a while.

This channel shares rare music like this to help people reflect on how even music can be used to influence or control.
